amendment.description: An amendment to strike title IV which overseas Contingency Operations Department of Defense.

action.text: Mr. Dent raised a point of order against the Mulvaney amendment (A015). Mr. Dent stated that the amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read for consideration. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
